allow: Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.20 'sudo systemctl status portainer semaphore')
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no admin@192.168.1.20 'echo ""Login successful"" && sudo systemctl status cloud-final')
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no operator@192.168.1.21 'echo ""SSH works""')
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=accept-new ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.20 'sudo systemctl status portainer semaphore-ui | grep Active')
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo systemctl status cloud-final")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo systemctl status portainer semaphore-ui | grep -E ''Active:|semaphore-ui.service|portainer.service''")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo grep -A5 -B5 ''vm-container-host'' /var/log/cloud-init-output.log | tail -30")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo grep -A10 ''Creating default inventory'' /var/log/cloud-init-output.log | tail -20")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo podman exec semaphore-ui ls -la /tmp/semaphore/")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo grep -B10 -A5 ''jq: invalid JSON'' /var/log/cloud-init-output.log")
Bash(SSHPASS='Changeme123' sshpass -e ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "sudo podman ps | grep adguard")
Bash(sshpass -p 'Changeme123' ssh ubuntuadmin@192.168.1.23 "find /opt /home/ubuntuadmin -name ''*.sh'' -type f 2>/dev/null | grep -E ''(setup|initial|proxmox|discover)'' | head -10")
Bash(for file in deploy-opnsense-vlans.yml opnsense-deploy.yml configure-opnsense-boot.yml download-opnsense.yml create-opnsense-vm.yml)
